channel.title: CVE Feed for B&R Industrial Automation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for B&R Industrial Automation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0323|2024-08-22T14:16:16.093Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20runtime
item.description: The FTP server used on the B&R Automation Runtime supports unsecure encryption mechanisms, such as SSLv3, TLSv1.0 and TLS1.1. An network-based attacker can exploit the flaws to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks or to decrypt communications between the affected product clients.

item.title: CVE-2024-5801|2024-08-12T14:44:00.687Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20runtime
item.description: Enabled IP Forwarding feature in B&R Automation Runtime versions before 6.0.2 may allow remote attack-ers to compromise network security by routing IP-based packets through the host, potentially by-passing firewall, router, or NAC filtering.

item.title: CVE-2024-5800|2024-08-12T14:32:22.309Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20runtime
item.description: Diffie-Hellman groups with insufficient strength are used in the SSL/TLS stack of B&R Automation Runtime versions before 6.0.2, allowing a network attacker to decrypt the SSL/TLS communication.

item.title: CVE-2021-22280|2024-08-03T18:37:18.537Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20studio
item.description: Improper DLL loading algorithms in B&R Automation Studio versions >=4.0 and <4.12 may allow an authenticated local attacker to execute code in the context of the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-2637|2024-08-01T19:18:48.124Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- scene%20viewer
item.description: An Uncontrolled Search Path Element vulnerability in B&R Industrial Automation Scene Viewer, B&R Industrial Automation Automation Runtime, B&R Industrial Automation mapp Vision, B&R Industrial Automation mapp View, B&R Industrial Automation mapp Cockpit, B&R Industrial Automation mapp Safety, B&R Industrial Automation VC4 could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute malicious code by placing specially crafted files in the loading search path.This issue affects Scene Viewer: before 4.4.0; Automation Runtime: before J4.93; mapp Vision: before 5.26.1; mapp View: before 5.24.2; mapp Cockpit: before 5.24.2; mapp Safety: before 5.24.2; VC4: before 4.73.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-2637|2024-06-06T14:56:12.677Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- scene%20viewer
item.description: An Uncontrolled Search Path Element vulnerability in B&R Industrial Automation Scene Viewer, B&R Industrial Automation Automation Runtime, B&R Industrial Automation mapp Vision, B&R Industrial Automation mapp View, B&R Industrial Automation mapp Cockpit, B&R Industrial Automation mapp Safety, B&R Industrial Automation VC4 could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute malicious code by placing specially crafted files in the loading search path.This issue affects Scene Viewer: before 4.4.0; Automation Runtime: before J4.93; mapp Vision: before 5.26.1; mapp View: before 5.24.2; mapp Cockpit: before 5.24.2; mapp Safety: before 5.24.2; VC4: before 4.73.2.

item.title: CVE-2021-22280|2024-07-26T15:53:35.178Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20studio
item.description: Improper DLL loading algorithms in B&R Automation Studio versions >=4.0 and <4.12 may allow an authenticated local attacker to execute code in the context of the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-5800|2024-08-10T03:50:02.159Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20runtime
item.description: Diffie-Hellman groups with insufficient strength are used in the SSL/TLS stack of B&R Automation Runtime versions before 6.0.2, allowing a network attacker to decrypt the SSL/TLS communication.

item.title: CVE-2024-5801|2024-08-10T03:52:02.326Z -- b%26r%20industrial%20automation -- automation%20runtime
item.description: Enabled IP Forwarding feature in B&R Automation Runtime versions before 6.0.2 may allow remote attack-ers to compromise network security by routing IP-based packets through the host, potentially by-passing firewall, router, or NAC filtering.
